abstracts.cdata!:
The purpose of the Third Tanzania
            Investment Bank Project is to meet part of TIB's
            foreign exchange requirements to cover its commitments
            through December 31, 1980. More specifically, the project
            will enable TIB to finance the planned increase in and
            diversification of its operations. In addition to its
            traditional financing of manufacturing enterprises, TIB
            expects to increase its work in agro-industries, transport
            and tourism.
